nodes.documentation:
@title Treasury Core
@dev Storage for the Treasury is at this address, while execution is delegated to the `TreasuryV1Impl`.
nodes.name: TreasuryCore
_acceptImplementation
_setPendingAdmin
_acceptAdmin

nodes.documentation:
@title Treasury Core
@dev Storage for the Treasury is at this address, while execution is delegated to the `TreasuryV1Impl`.
nodes.name: TreasuryCore
_acceptImplementation
_setPendingAdmin
_acceptAdmin

devdoc.details: Storage for the Treasury is at this address, while execution is delegated to the `TreasuryV1Impl`.

_acceptAdmin().details: Admin function for pending admin to accept role and update admin
_acceptAdmin().return: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure (see ErrorReporter.sol for details)

_acceptImplementation().details: Admin function for new implementation to accept it's role as implementation
_acceptImplementation().return: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure (see ErrorReporter.sol for details)

_setPendingAdmin(address).details: Admin function to begin change of admin. The newPendingAdmin must call `_acceptAdmin` to finalize the transfer.
_setPendingAdmin(address).return: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure (see ErrorReporter.sol for details)

devdoc.title: Treasury Core

_acceptAdmin().notice: Accepts transfer of admin rights. msg.sender must be pendingAdmin

_acceptImplementation().notice: Accepts new implementation of Treasury. msg.sender must be pendingImplementation

_setPendingAdmin(address).notice: Begins transfer of admin rights. The newPendingAdmin must call `_acceptAdmin` to finalize the transfer.
